title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 29 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 29 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3: Attorney General Merrick Garland sends warning to states not to revert their voting systems to pre-covid, non-emergency status. Democrats need mail-in voting to cheat. Mayor Bill de Blasio promises new mask rules for NYC coming Monday. Senator Schumer (D-NY): You think covid was bad, climate change will be much worse -- if we don't pass $4.1 trillion in infrastructure spending. Sen. Tommy Tuberville (R-AL) joins Clay and Buck to discuss new NCAA changes, infrastructure and out-of-control spending. We can't let the left destroy sports in America. Inflation is going to hit us right between the eyes. Olympian Michael Phelps defends Simone Biles.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
